summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1187 for the improvement of Holgate Street; from First Avenue South to Ninth Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains, gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances therein, under Ordinance No. 13203, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, declaring the same to be a first lien thereon, and providing for the collection of said assessment.
